mapper.insert: insert into t_applications ( form_id as formId, user_id as userId, group_id as groupId, app_title as appTitle, app_desc as appDesc, place_id as placeId, attendance as attendance, start_time as startTime, end_time as endTime, create_time as createTime ) values(#{formId},#{userId},#{groupId},#{appTitle}, #{appDesc},#{placeId},#{attendance},#{startTime}, #{endTime},#{createTime},)
mapper.update: update t_applications set app_title=#{appTitle}, start_time=#{startTime}, end_time=#{endTime}, attendance=#{attendance}, place_id=#{placeId}, app_desc=#{appDesc}, update_time=#{updateTime} where form_id=#{formId}
mapper.select: select ta.form_id as formId, ta.user_id as userId, ta.group_id as groupId, ta.app_title as appTitle, DATE_FORMAT(ta.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as startTime, DATE_FORMAT(ta.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as endTime, ta.place_id as placeId, tp.place_name as placeName, tu.zn_name as znName, ta.attendance as attendance, ta.verify_status as verifyStatus, ta.app_desc as appDesc, DATE_FORMAT(ta.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as createTime from t_applications as ta left join t_user as tu on ta.user_id = tu.user_id left join t_place as tp on ta.place_id = tp.place_id where ta.group_id = #{groupId}

select ta.form_id as formId, ta.user_id as userId, ta.group_id as groupId, ta.app_title as appTitle, DATE_FORMAT(ta.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as startTime, DATE_FORMAT(ta.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as endTime, ta.place_id as placeId, tp.place_name as placeName, ta.attendance as attendance, ta.verify_status as verifyStatus, ta.app_desc as appDesc, DATE_FORMAT(ta.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as createTime from t_applications as ta left join t_user as tu on ta.user_id = tu.user_id left join t_place as tp on ta.place_id = tp.place_id where ta.user_id = #{userId}

select ta.form_id as formId, ta.app_title as appTitle, ta.start_time as startTime, ta.end_time as endTime, ta.attendance as attendance, ta.place_id as placeId, ta.app_desc as appDesc from t_applications as ta where form_id = #{formId}
select tp.place_id as placeId, tp.place_name as placeName from t_place as tp
